title: Dr. Jaclyn Bain | Naturopathic Physicians | Sonoran Patients
description: Dr. Jaclyn Bain empowers patients through education, understanding, and healing. She provides her patients with a wide array of naturopathic treatment options.
cleaned_text: Dr. Jaclyn Bain empowers patients and their parents through education, understanding, and honesty. She provides her patients with standard-of-care recommendations and is happy to discuss potential complementary and alternative medicine approaches when appropriate. Nutrition, classical homeopathy, biomedical therapies, lifestyle optimization, risk factor education, and botanical medicine are her preferred methods to guide patients toward better health. She considers food insecurity, picky eating, and sensory challenges when guiding families. Dr. Bain highly encourages parents to follow the recommended immunization schedule for children approved by the American Academy of Pediatrics and the CDC. Dr. Bain offers vaccine counseling as well as child checks so you can be educated and confident about your child's care. Dr. Bain has completed three mentorships with a focus in pediatrics and autism. Additionally, she conducts clinical research to further advance the understanding and treatment of children with autism spectrum disorder. Dr. Bain has a passion for philanthropy and is dedicated to helping families find the care they need. Pediatrics, Autism Spectrum Disorder Bachelor of Science in Biology with minor in Women and Gender Studies, The College of New Jersey, 2009 Southwest College of Naturopathic Medicine, 2013 General Medicine Residency, National University of Natural Medicine, 2014 Pediatric Association of Naturopathic Physicians (pedANP), Current PedANP Board Member
